name: e-commerce-root
description: Root script to run all services

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin && npm run dev" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ADMIN" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta"
